Sentencas: Ni-based cermets are the most widely used anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Reducing the content of Ni is beneficial to anode stability but usually unfavorable for the catalytic activity.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, Ni-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-& delta; anode with a low Ni content is synthesized through a polymer-directed evaporation-induced self-assembly strategy.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni distributes evenly in the anode, resulting in an enlarged triple-phase boundary region and improved reactivity of lattice oxygen in the oxide phase.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The anode containing 5 wt.% Ni possesses the highest amounts of oxygen vacancies and Ce3+/Ce4+ redox pairs that facilitates the charge transfer process, which is one of the rate-determining steps of anode reaction.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Consequently, that anode shows the lowest polarization resistance of 0.014 & omega; cm(2) at 700 & DEG;C, much lower than those of other Ni-based anodes prepared through conventional techniques such as impregnation and solid-mixing.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With that anode, a single cell supported by a 480-& mu;m-thick Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-& delta; electrolyte layer exhibits the maximum power density of 270 mW cm(-2) at 700 & DEG;C. The anode also shows a promising stability.
Titulo: Achieve a high electrochemical oxidation activity by a self-assembled cermet composite anode with low Ni content for solid oxide fuel cells
